website_summaries.verdict: With a host of organic ingredients, this mask can at least make you look like you've reversed in age.
pros: Non-GMO, certified organic, and highly effective in terms of doing its job and revealing softer, glowing skin
Tingles in a good way, assuring you that the product is breaking down layers of dead skin cells
See reductions in spots and large pore sizes after a single use
cons: While short term effects help with the appearance of imperfections, long term results are rarely noted

customer_reviews.title: What the professionals use.
customer_reviews.text: This is what the place I go to uses. I totally raided their drawers after my face treatment and found this. I was paying $20 extra bucks to get this added to my already $60 treatment. Now I just do it at home.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AMAZING!!!!!!!!!! I took a chance on this product and it worked for me. I'm African American, late 50s and at this point you can't stop MOTHER NATURE but all though my teen years I prided myself on keeping a good beauty routine and it paid off I still get comments on how good my skin looks. I have always used 1 famous known product line, but now my skin has gotten so familiar with the same products that it doesn't perform the same(and the prices now are SCARY). I brought a few of these items AND BEAUTIFUL RESULTS. Who ever you are THANKS ANDALOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cleaves

customer_reviews.title: Pumpkin Heaven!😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: The jar came filled to the top and In perfect shape! It smells heavenly but I can see how other people may have a problem with scent though I don’t mind it at all 😍 it applies pretty easily but my skin had a little tingling feeling, nothing too bad. I showed the before and after results If you’re interested. My skin feels refreshed! I hope my review was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: SunShine

customer_reviews.title: This mask makes my skin glow!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pumpkin face mask! I use 2-3x per week at night for 20 mins and then use a night vitamin C serum. I have combination skin, not sensitive. This mask makes my skin bright and glow! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE! I have tried a variety of masks...but this one really seems to work the best!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff buying again !
customer_reviews.text: See results after one use. Your skin will glow, very impressed. Has a little tingle feeling but after just one use I was told my skin was glowing the next day! I'd use it the night before something special or a few hours before going out so redness can lessen. Looks like babyfood but smells amazing. I used to have severe acne after being on accutane I have clear skin but wanted to work on my pores, sun damage (I do tan) and dark spots. This mask helps make me feel amazing. Very impressed with this product. I do about 20mins and wash with cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: This mask is amazing. I have acne-prone-oily skin and this mask does ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy guacamole!!! This mask is amazing. I have acne-prone-oily skin and this mask does wonders to my skin. Just love it. I feel this cool sensation on application and my skin looks radiant after rinsing it off. Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Smac85

customer_reviews.title: This is not the same product!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first jar of this I bought came sealed in shrink wrap. I absolutely love it, it does a superb job getting all of the surface debris off and leaving smooth skin. This batch I got however, came in boxes that were not in shrink wrap. As you can see from the images, the product has a sickly brown color while the original is bright orange. The sent is also different; there is almost an undertone of plastic. Whatever the hell it is, it’s not touching my skin. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Tracey A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for rosacea!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Andalou! I purchased the Food mask which I use at night, the Gogi Peptide cream which I use under my makeup, and the night cream. I have terrible rosacea. I've never found anything that doesn't make my skin worse. The first day there was a substantially noticeable difference after the Food mask. I'm on the 3rd day now and my skin is bright, so soft, and you can hardly see the rosacea. So glad I purchased this! Really life changing. I have extremely sensitive skin and none of these products bothered my skin at all. I'm just thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Anissa Varnell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and am sensitive to perfumes, for example lavender gives me an instant headache. I love this product. It makes my skin feel so soft and fresh and hydrated! I love the scent of roses, and it isn't a heavy overpowering perfume-y scent, just a nice natural rose, softly perfumed. My teenage daughter keeps stealing it and using it as a daily moisturizer, she loves it too, lol! It never makes her break out and I don't have any adverse skin or chemical reactions to it. Win, win!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkler8666

customer_reviews.title: Favorite new skin care products Cruelty Free
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product, I am 45 years old of east Indian decent and my boyfriend noticed results as early as week 2. I followed the regime in the starter kit and am very satisfied in overall skin texture, softening lines and evening skin tone. Mildly scented very pleasant and clean. I'm not wearing makeup in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: I must've gotten an old jar (of the Pumpkin one). Had an "off" smell and did not work. I've purchased this in the past (from the brand's site) and really liked it. Even tried this jar a few times to make sure, and it's definitely expired. Wished I'd asked for a refund :(
customer_reviews.author: Zaranisa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Rose ingredients have changed my life! I started using a rose water because I suffer from adult acne especially in my chin area and instantly saw results! In an effort to continue my clear skin success I bought this product and love it! Makes me feel like I'm getting a mini facial at home before bed. This helpa keep my skin in check! After I wash it off I use an organic rose water before bed. I will buy this again after I'm done with my current one.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: MESSED UP MY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: this product messed up my skin! it literally burned my face! I find it funny how I can also not able to upload attatchment photos to this post. I wanted to show everyone to caution u guys. It took two and a half weeks for my skin to go down but left scarring due to the blisters that popped. I have experience using products with glycolic acid and never have I experienced something like this. I wanted to hope it would work but this was a disappointment for me and I couldnt get my money back because of the no refund policy
customer_reviews.author: TheHolisticWitch

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This mask has a nice texture, somewhere in between whipped and cream. The rose smell isn’t overpowering, and it’s easy to remove. I don’t have super dry skin, and bought this to use after I use some masks that dry out my face or when I start to feel dry spots from acne medication. Though I enjoyed the mask while it was on, I don’t know that I actually helped to moisturize much. Will not buy again most likely
customer_reviews.author: momof3dogsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Mini Chemical Peel
customer_reviews.text: As the label clearly states, this is a glycolic acid mask. It burns like holy hell if you use it after you manually exfoliate, but if you can suck it up for the first minute, the burning feeling fades. This mask is perfect for someone who is just beginning a real skincare routine and wants to start off with a fresh palette.
customer_reviews.author: Giesele Bergmann

customer_reviews.title: Light moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This mask feels less like a mask, and more like I'm spreading a very lightweight facial moisturizer on and then rinsing after 15 min. It does sting a TINY bit when I first put it on, but it's barely noticeable. My skin after felt a bit tighter and smoother, so I'll continue to use this every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Katy. Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Burns like hell
customer_reviews.text: There is no reason why any face mask should burn my skin and turn it visibly red almost instantly upon application. I don’t even want to know what kind of damage I have inflicted on my poor skin by trying out this mask. Into the trash it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Best Mask I’ve Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for a while and it’s one of my top favorite products I’ve ever tried. I’ve noticed fine lines and wrinkles start to diminish after using it. Even after one use my skin looks like I’ve had a professional facial.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Levans

customer_reviews.title: I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 boxes for the gifts. Product arrived in 3 separate plastic bags, very damages, unsealed box and container had been opened and look bad. Boxes are damaged and jars too. I can not return this !!! so lost 30 $ .
customer_reviews.author: Irena

customer_reviews.title: Very good mask
customer_reviews.text: I cannot brag enough about this I’ve only been using it for a week and my results have been amazing . I am glad this mask is an affordable product . I love it. I have dry acne prone skin. It does have a burning sensation for a good minute then goes away. After the first use I get a cooling sensation then it goes away. I am able to put it on for 20 minutes depending on how i feel.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It's like putting chocolate mousse or rich pudding on your face, smells delicious. Cocoa powder is great for your skin, this mask leaves your face glowy and rosy in a healthy way. There was a microsecond of that mild fruit acid burn at first, but went away before I'd even really noticed it. Left it on for about 15 minutes, did not dry out and become crackly and itchy, rinsed off quickly. If you have very sensitive or allergic skin, probably not for you, but otherwise it's terrific. My skin is very fair and freckly, but I do well with glycolic acid washes, and this mask was fine on my face, No burning sting, no redness.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you have sensitive skin!!
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing I can say for this mask is that it smells wonderful, like warm pumpkin spice. Unfortunately it broke my face out in a rash...I’m not sure if I’m allergic to an ingredient or my skin is just more sensitive than most. I left it on for just a few minutes and rinsed and woke up the next morning with a red sensitive rash that lasted for a week. Really bummed I even spent money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah G

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it's fine
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this collection but it just fell flat. The moisturizers are fine. They work okay. Definitely not comparable to products I've used in the past. While they do provide moisture to my skin, they leave me wanting more. I tried the DTOX mask twice and saw no difference or reason to buy more. The Xfoliate Scrub has decent exfoliation but again, nothing impressive. The toner was my favorite product. It works pretty well. The scent for all products is pretty strong, and I'm guessing you'll either love it or hate it. Very citrusy with a chemical aftersmell
customer_reviews.author: AlliCat0420

customer_reviews.title: This kit lasted me about a month. I am ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit lasted me about a month. I am very impressed...I had 2 dark spots from sun damage on my upper cheek bone and it bothered me a lot...this product help make it fade to where it's not as noticeable. Maybe in a few months it will be completely gone who knows. My face texture and tone has evened out a little more as well. I bought a 2nd kit and will be buying the regular sizes soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Be careful and follow the instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Burns like a mother if left on too long. Buy the neutralizing spray or if you can make your own do it! Cause water does not help. I left on and had some bad burns on my face. My fault as a first time user thinking I can leave on for too long. But it did what it said it did. I recommend and suggest you follow the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Mask!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this Pumpkin mask 2 times, but I can already see a difference! This is now my new favorite mask! Yes, it burns, but in a good way. I left it on for 20 minutes the first time and I was fine (I am part Armenian and have olive/darker skin, so not sensitive). It tingled and burned, but like I said, in a good way. After 20 minutes, I washed it off with cool water. Yes, my skin was a little red after removing it, but not too bad. After removing it, I moisturized then went to bed. The next morning my face looked and felt wonderful! I love this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Love Reading Historical Romance

customer_reviews.title: Good fruit enzyme mask
customer_reviews.text: I recently had my first facial, and the facialist recommended that I introduced a fruit enzyme exfoliator into my skin care regimen. My mom recommended this one, which she's been using for the past year or so. I've only used it twice so far, but my skin does look better after, and feels really soft and less dry generally. I gave it four stars instead of five only because I don't *love* the smell (it smells kind of like chemical pumpkin pie).
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Showers

customer_reviews.title: Irritating
customer_reviews.text: This mask unfortunately burned and irritated my skin, had to rinse off immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! It gets rid of dead skin by dissolving it, leaving skin clear and fresh. You will need to moisturize after using this! Easy to use and wash off - no fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice starter kit to see how I would like some of the more expensive products. I did not care for the cleansing milk or the perfecting cream but the toner was nice and I ended up buying a full size of the night cream. I have sensitive, acne prone skin and when I ran out of the night cream my skin knew it. I generally use the Andalou BB Clarity cream during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon AB

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and brightening
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be like other "detox" clay masks I've used that dry down to a paste. This mask stays moist on your skin. It has definitely brightened and deeply moisturized my skin. I like using this one first thing in the morning when I wake up. I leave it on for 20 minutes while I sip my coffee. It rinses off so nicely with just water and then I apply the rest of my regimen. (Andalou Cannacell Toner and Facial Oil). This combination is working incredibly well for me. My pigmentation has completely lightened and my skin has dramatically cleared. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of cosmetics! My best bet. Perfect composition. I wanted to try the whole line. Usually I take only milk for washing. This set is very convenient to take with you on a trip or just get to know the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected it to be
customer_reviews.text: I really never write negative reviews but after reading all the great comments on this product (which is why I went with it) I was super bummed once I tried it out. To me it didn't smell like pumpkin at all and there was no "tingle" effect. Wish I could return this but can't so I will be trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: I find that this mask has helped to brighten some ...
customer_reviews.text: I find that this mask has helped to brighten some of my scarring from blemishes and also lightened my melasma from my pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Nina N.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like you slept 12 hours
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! Andalou naturals is a brand I have used many products from and have enjoyed all of them. I particularly love this mask. It gently exfoliates skin leaving you looking refreshed instantly. I highly recommend it and intend to repurchase as soon as I run out.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainAwesome

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive version of a high-end product that yields great results
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of the Peter Thomas Roth Pumpkin Enzyme mask as a gift and loved it; however, when I went to buy it I was shocked at the $60 price tag. I saw the reviews on here that said this was just like it and they couldn't tell the difference. It's true! It smells, feels, and yields the same results for a fraction of the cost. It does tingle/burn slightly when you put it on like the Roth mask, but I believe that is part of the acids working. It lasts only briefly and then your skin is so bright, clear, and soft afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly unsure if this does much to my skin or not as I do not have sensitive skin. I have aging, oily skin that can actually handle much stronger stuff. The reason I purchased this mask was for the amazing smell alone. It really does smell like 1000 roses! Can’t beat that or the price! I use this mask whenever my skin feels beat up from harsh treatment and also to multimask. I strongly recommend this mask and do intend to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Al of them from Andalou! It is best ingredients! Thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, feels great, but no advantage for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, but it's just "okay." It smells delicious, so I'll keep using it to wrap myself in the smell of pumpkin pie for 20 minutes relaxation. It tingled for about 2 minutes (I like that, I thought it was working its magic) but the next 18 min was no tingle. Did I mention it smells soooo good. Had texture like slapping canned pumpkin on your face. But, ultimately, it did not make my skin feel better in any way. I won't buy it again. Also, I looked for an expiration date, in case it was too old to be working, but there is no expiration date on the jar or package. 🎃
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. John Carter

customer_reviews.title: wonderful but do not eat.
customer_reviews.text: so even if hundreds of people in forbidden snacks are screaming "DO IT DO IT" do NOT taste this. it smells just like pumpkin purée and looks exactly like it too and i was curious. it tasted like what i imagine that Phenylthiocarbamide paper tasted like in science class when half the kids were spitting into the trash because it tasted super bitter and just ew
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Mask
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask so much! It goes on like a clear gel. My skin is so much softer after just two uses. I put it on after double cleansing with jojoba oil and my Dr Bronners Liquid Castile soap for about 20 minutes. I then rinse off with cool water and moisturize with niacinamide and rosehip oil. Fantastic results. I would buy again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised. Noticeable difference immediately
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling to find a make up look that didn't leave my skin looking chalky. I decided to start with my skin care routine. I wanted something affordable I could try because I have bought so many full size expensive products only to find that they did not work. After only a few days I could feel and see the difference and have ordered all the products in the sample kit except the mask which I haven't tried yet but am planning to. Product arrived on time as promised and is working well. I'm very pleased. Thank you to all the positive reviews that prompted me to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Osteen

customer_reviews.title: It definitely TINGLES when you put it on. NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: So im honestly not sure how to rate it. I've been using it weekly for a month and I will say my skin does seem brighter in appearance. However, I always have a moment of nervousness when I first apply it, because it feels like it is burning your skin. Even thought the feeling is more of a burning sensation than tingling, I've never experience redness or a breakout from the product. I do feel mild sensitivity afterwards.... I've never considered myself to have sensitive skin, but I do find this formula to be a BIT aggressive in nature.
customer_reviews.author: dcdc

customer_reviews.title: Gentle enough to use 2-3 times a week
customer_reviews.text: I stopped wearing makeup during quarantine, so I've been enjoying treating it with various products . This smells delicious, I use it 2-3 times a week, super easy to apply, leave on for 20 minutes, then wipe off with cool water and a wash cloth. My cheeks are VERY smooth after I used it, and my skin is never red or irritated and I haven't had a single zit, which often happens when trying a new product.
customer_reviews.author: C. MorrisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Cannabis is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Made from the seeds of hemp aka cannabis sativa! it's a miracle medicine and once again it's worked better for me then any other acne product that I ended up buying the larger versions which aren't much larger sadly
customer_reviews.author: BrandonH

customer_reviews.title: Seems fake
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars if possible. This product arrived in a suspiciously sloppy shrink wrap. The product itself does not have the color, scent, or texture of the one that I had purchased from a reliable brick and mortar store. The texture is not smooth. The scent is like pumpkin pie. The color is the same as canned pumpkin. Which is what I suspect this is. I was so wary of this product that I did not want to put it on my face and threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Night Cream
customer_reviews.text: I know you’re supposed to use it as a mask, BUT it works great as a moisturizing night cream. Especially in the cold winter months and/or if you wear makeup daily. I put it on after I take off my makeup and wash my face. The next morning not only is my face soft but my acne marks are lighter too!! I have oily skin, and it doesn’t make my face extra oily either. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Asia Bingaman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mask
customer_reviews.text: This is my first hemp mask. It feels almost like an active mask. Feels tingly and warm but in a good way. Really helps bring up the toxins to the surface so you can wash away. I want to try everything in the cannacell line now. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Burns Skin
customer_reviews.text: Completely burned my skin upon application. Washed it immediately and my face had red patches. I rinsed my face for an additional 10 minutes at the coldest temperature it came out of the faucet which alleviated the sting. I’ve purchased this particular mask brand at Whole Foods before and had a great experience, but I believe what I received from Amazon is fake.
customer_reviews.author: Monica N Samayoa

customer_reviews.title: amazing 🖤
customer_reviews.text: i never write reveiws, but i just washed this gem off my face and am in love! for those writing or reading the negative reviews, be sure you read thru all the ingredients before using and make sure you are not allergic to anything listed! it did not burn, just a warm tingling sensation! after i applied all over my face, i kept it on for 10 minutes. in the future i will increase that time! after i washed it off my skin felt amazing. it looked CLEAN and bright. up close, my blackheads diminished and my pores looked much smaller. so excited to continue using this... i absolutely love it! plus it smells heavenly!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin burn. Not for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so sensitive. I also try to use anything that's not tested on animals. I try to get organic or items free of parabens. But I always seem to get products that have one preservative in it that I'm absolutely allergic to. There are so many other preservatives that can be used for these products. Doesn't matter how organic it is, or the fact that it's not tested on animals or anything. But if it's got a chemical in it that burns your skin none of the rest of it really matters. Your skin's not sensitive this will work. If your skin is sensitive to chemical preservatives this won't work for you. Just speaking from experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Truly heavenly.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rave enough about this brand, and this mask is truly heavenly. I bought a sample pack from Sprouts Market for me and my mom and I fell in love instantly. It’s like applying a cool butter to your face, and it smells AMAZING. My face is super moisturized and noticeably healthier looking after use.
customer_reviews.author: RSEH

customer_reviews.title: Works initially but there is a plateau
customer_reviews.text: The first two weeks I used this (3x per week), I did notice that my overall complexion lightened to the point where I had to switch back to my winter shade in foundation and BB cream. After the first two weeks I saw no further brightening. I've continued using it only because I don't want to waste it, but my hyperpigmentation never improved. I have continued to use my winter shades in makeup. As far as what it does for my acne I would say not much.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Works for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Pros: *doesn't dry out my sensitive skin (leave on for minimal amount of time, will burn at first but goes away after a few minutes.) *helps acne scars and skin texture. Doesn’t bleach skin. *great ingredient list *smells like pumpkin pie *easy to use Cons: * burns for the first few minutes. * skin will be red for a little while after. * doesn’t come with a ton of product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: glooowww ✨
customer_reviews.text: i love this face mask so much! it gave my skin such a beautiful glow and my skin was visibly smooth. i used a vitamin e face oil to moisturize after. i was a little worried about the burning sensation after reading reviews but i had more of a cool sensation that wasn’t uncomfortable at all. i bought this mask to clear the dark spots on the side on my face and will come back with results after the jar is finished. 💞
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia Rosa LLC

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, easy to applicate & Great results
customer_reviews.text: I have a few dark spots and I am 30 so I do glycolic and salicylic peels at home with a few TCA ones as well and this is a great product to add to your beauty routine. I am a single mother of 2 boys so I do not have the time or money to spend at a office so the things I do buy and try the ones I love and that actually work I write reviews and share what works and what doesn't! I have sensitive skin so this is a great product and i am always up for trying new things!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B

customer_reviews.title: It burns good !
customer_reviews.text: The burning sensation is normal due to the glycolic acid. If you’re using retin-A or any other aha’s it works well in combination with them however I’d say skip one day of retinol then use this in the mornings or evening and apply a good moisturizer with hyaluronic acid afterwards. I sometimes get a little bit of pinkness in my skin after wards which is also normal remember glycolic acid does that but it fades in 20 mins and leaves your skin nice and bright I try to use this once a week if not at least every 10 days or so
customer_reviews.author: A1986

customer_reviews.title: Do no buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful! I don’t have particularly sensitive skin but this product burned my face within second from application. I didn’t even get a chance to spread it! Absolute trash!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing happened after finishing a whole bottle a few months later
customer_reviews.text: After using it every night and finishing a whole bottle, not a trace of improvement to be noticed. Also, it's kind of laborious for routine use where you first have to wash the face clean to put it on, waiting for a few minutes, then going back to wash it off again before you putting on all other toner, serum and moisturizer face care products. Too much time wasted! I am looking for a product that can be applied with all other face care without washing face clean twice within a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: CutePug

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a chilled sleeping mask. I was looking for an alternative to the Peter Thomas Ross Rose mask. This is far superior in ingredients and moisture. I love all their masks but this is my favorite. Mixed with Origins hydrating sleep mask will make your skin soft as a baby bum
customer_reviews.author: Kat & Karen's Shared Account

customer_reviews.title: Pumpkin Spice Facial
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I have sensitive skin and this mask can be a little intense when you first put it on, but it just feels like it’s working. If you keep it on for a bit (10-15 minutes) your skin will feel baby soft when you wash it away. I’m not typically a pumpkin spice fan but the scent is pretty soothing. It smells like you walking around the Holiday aisle at Michael’s Crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: buy this right now!!
customer_reviews.text: i am obsessed with this product!! this is honestly my favorite mask for my skin. i have very bad acne and hyperpigmentation/scaring and this makes me skin appear a lot brighter and dewy. when i wake up in the morning my skin in GLOWING. i leave mine on for about 20 min but if you have sensitive skin leave it on for a shorter amount of time. i noticed that when i leave it on for too long i don’t get the same effects.
customer_reviews.author: Tika

customer_reviews.title: my skin looks great. The stinging wasn't as strong as I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working ... my skin looks great. The stinging wasn't as strong as I had anticipated, since many reviews had mentioned that. Matter of fact, I get very little stinging at all.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenating
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin that is easily agitated. I also live in a cold northern climate. That being said, I can use this product up to twice a week without any drawback. I apply to clean, dry skin before bedtime. I have bright, clear skin the morning after. This mask feels like a luxury and I look forward to the nights I use it. This is my first go around with a glycolic acid mask so take that for what it's worth. I'm definitely interested to try other products by this skin care line and will most likely repurchase this when it runs out. ♡
customer_reviews.author: Candis

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle, could probably be used daily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because an aesthetician recommended a pumpkin mask to help with my acne. I’ve only used it twice so far and haven’t noticed a difference yet. It does feels cool on my skin. The first time I used it it gave my skin a slight burning, tingling sensation so I only kept it on for 10 minutes. The sensation went away as it dried and I didn’t see any adverse effects. It has made my skin feel smoother. I think it might be too gentle for my acne and I may have to splurge on a stronger product once I use up this little jar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great anti-inflammatory face mask!
customer_reviews.text: Really helps flare ups of irritated skin, pimples, and any inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need for acne prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a person who has trouble finding the right product for my skin. I have terrible cystic acne and I have a very physical outdoor job, so sweat + humidity is always going to destroy my skin. This face mask keeps me hydrated without over-saturating my skin. I LOVE the creamy texture, it washes off nicely, and smells fantastic. It is a veeeeery heavy rose smell, so be warned! Overall, great product to use once a week, well priced, and lasts a good long while!
customer_reviews.author: C. McKenna

customer_reviews.title: In effective.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the product. It did nothing. I like the glycolic honey mask so much more. I’ll be getting more of that.
customer_reviews.author: BigAnil

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, I use before I do my skin peel like one reviewer posted. This is a great product, Now that my skin looks great I use this once a month then I use this in combination with my skin peel the next month (4-6 weeks). So, far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Paulsgirl

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: READ ME: This mask burn once applied, I recommend fanning your face right after applying it. IT HELPS TRUST ME the sensation stops after 2 min. Apply with a brush!! Also moisturize after using this mask. I’ve used this 4 times already I see a huge different already this brighten the face alright my acne scars have faded lighter than what they use to be! Im so glad I found this, my scars will be gone within a course of a few weeks rather than months on its own with now product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Valdez

customer_reviews.title: A must for this skin-care snob. THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. It had a slight tingle that makes me feel as if it’s actually doing something! It’s kind of gross looking, but smells like thanksgiving. I feel like my skin is rejuvenated after! A++++Follow up with Andalou vit c toning spray and a vitamin c serum for a nutrient packed experience! Just like a salon!
customer_reviews.author: macmamma25

customer_reviews.title: It Works Wonders. It's Not Just For Babies!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it for the kids and it keeps their bottoms healthy and smooth. What surprised me was using some on my Elderly Mom's chaffing skin and how wonderfully it stopped the itching and healed the area. My cousin was visiting and had what looked like abrasions where straps from his work gear rub against his skin. . Boom. Instant relief on the area and the irritated skin is healing nicely. It works wonders for All the generations of my family. It's not just for Babies, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Adventure

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for many months now and I absolutely love it! I use it about once a week, and afterwards my skin is very smooth and firm. You don’t need a lot, so one small tub lasts a while. I will be buying this again and again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: What has happened to Andalou?
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Andalou products, so when I saw they had a set with Glycolic mask in it, I definitely wanted to try it. I have sensitive skin, so I figured I would feel something right away. I left it on for 20 mins. each time, and nothing happened...absolutely nothing. It's sad to say, but I hope their products are not going downhill. Definitely do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Molly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products!
customer_reviews.text: All of these products work great on my extra sensitive skin. I am also super sensitive to fragrances, there’s a slight all natural citrus-like scent that doesn’t bother me and doesn’t linger. I’m so glad for the trial sizes. They are all excellent, I’m glad I didn’t waste any money, I will be buying the cleanser in the full size.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Look into how good pumpkin is for your skin 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Pumpkin is amazing for your skin! We do pumpkin peels at our salon and this is the next best thing to use at home that is like a mini peel. I use it twice a week and even some personal clients. It’s worth more than what it’s sold for. My favorite mask but still use a calming mask afterwards since it does tingle a little from the Glycolic acid.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Gentle And soothing, not heavy enough for night.
customer_reviews.text: I have oily combination skin that is very sensitive to fragrance and ingredients. This cream is gentle enough that it doesn’t break me out or leave me red. The rose scent is also lovely and relaxing. I wouldn’t necessarily call this a night cream just because it isn’t quite rich enough. It makes a great day cream under my sunscreen and I layer it at night with a heavier night cream for extra hydration. By itself, it just isn’t enough.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Maszk

customer_reviews.title: Irritating
customer_reviews.text: This irritated my skin and gave me a few hives. I do lactic acid peels weekly so this must be stronger than that? Or maybe it's the cinnamon... not sure, but would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Pumpkin smells so good
customer_reviews.text: I love all products I've tried from Andalou Naturals. The brightening pumpkin mask is no different. It smells SO good!!!! I will say, if you don't like pumpkin, you won't like this. It doesn't hurt my skin at all. It feels so refreshing and makes my skin feel beautiful! I can't wait to try all their other masks
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mask and try to use it a couple times a week. On my second container. Sometimes I wash my face when I get home from work and just leave this on until I go to bed. It sinks right in and is invisible. Makes my skin so soft and smooth. The rose scent is great.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn B

customer_reviews.title: Brightens but might clog pores
customer_reviews.text: This did not burn me or cause my sensitive skin any discomfort. My face felt moisturized and clean, and looked brighter immediately upon removal. However within a few days I had many more clogged pores than before and I suspect it was likely from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marou

customer_reviews.title: smells like pumpkin
customer_reviews.text: Really this has no effect what-so-ever .. skin looks same, no 'softness' no moisture difference in skin texture, no radiance .. over all very disappointed. As I said the only positive is that it actually smells like pumpkin
customer_reviews.author: perry

customer_reviews.title: Best products by far for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I use them all and am so in love. I have super super sensitive skin and these product feel amazing. Even the foaming cleanser leaves your face soft. It is not drying at all. The glow mask makes you look like you just had a spa beach day! I cannot day enough good things about it. I buy the smaller pkg bundle and use it for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Myhj68

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for super sensitive skin, but is a lovely product!
customer_reviews.text: packaging - 10/10 super cute... scent- 5/10 (unless you like raw pumpkin scent) ... came quickly and nothing wrong with package mailed in! my skin is super sensitive and I went red as a tomato... my husband is less sensitive and he was fine but still a bit red... perhaps left on for too long but followed instructions ... did not break out from it or dislike it, but redness threw me off a bit! But overall didn’t mind it aside from that!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling & moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. I bought the sample size to see if I would like, now going to buy the regular size. I’m not sure if it works on under eye wrinkles or bags and darkness. I love the fruit scent. It isn’t overly strong scented. Just a fresh fruity scent. And it didn’t burn my skin or a blemish
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't perform as promised!
customer_reviews.text: I used this a week after a chemical peel. Supposedly, it gets rid of the rest of the dead skin. It did not. In fact, it didn't even make a dent. I might as well have put water on my face. I'm a skincare fanatic, and I know my products and ingredients. This one sounded pretty decent, but it didn't deliver. Super disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Least favorite mask to date.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this but honestly the smell was the first thing I tried to get past and then within seconds it started burning my skin. Like burning so bad I had to instantly rinse it off in fear of a visible burn. I have very strong skin, not sensitive and I could not handle it. My daughter did it with me and didn’t feel any burn but said because of the smell she will never use it again either.
customer_reviews.author: Jaela

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I’m a regular user of a retinol product (that I also purchase from amazon) and sometimes use a little too much which results in flakey skin. I remedy that by using this pumpkin mask. It’s just as effective as products many times the price and leaves my skin flake free. This allows maximum benefit from my moisturizer and makes for terrific looking skin ready for foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Picachu

customer_reviews.title: Bit of heat but still good
customer_reviews.text: Likes: I love the smell of this product and I love the effect it has on my face after I’m done using it. Dislikes: It burns my face, it doesn’t cause any damage and the redness goes away pretty quickly but it is unpleasant. I have used it a few times and it happens every time. Still works great just not fun with the burning sensation. Not saying it’ll burn you either my skin is really sensitive to certain ingredients and I’m still learning what causes these effects. Other: the texture is just like baby food, not sure how I feel about that
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Good modern exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: That is a very powerful though very gentle exfoliate. Not sure if it is good for sensitive skin though. I use it once a week. After this make I get baby skin. Smells very nice. Just like pumpkin honey and has a nice bright orange color. It burns just a bit the first minute after the application, no wonder, the acids get to work, after that there is no sensation. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: My favourite face mask and smells delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I love face masks. I've tried so many of them and although I keep buying new ones, I tend to alternate between 2 or 3 favourites. This is my favourite for moisturizing...and it's the most fun! It smells delicious, so you get the affect of aromatherapy as well..and who doesn't like chocolate smeared on their face! I'm a repeat purchaser of this product and have even purchased for my friends as gifts, I love it that much.
customer_reviews.author: VerLin

customer_reviews.title: No Safety Seal, burned skin!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to check this out after reading all the good reviews. Upon arrival I noticed it did not have a safety seal of any kind. I still tried it but it immediately felt like my skin was burning. Skin was red and looked darker after treatment. I've used it twice since but had the same result. Going straight in the trash. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed box
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in an unsealed box and container had been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I am 62 years old and I wanted to try this product so I bought the starting kit. I am using the Naturals Age Defying line and I love it! My skin is softer , more radiant, but hard to tell if it is reducing fine lines, yet. I have now moved on to the full size products which is priced very reasonably. I do not have sensitive skin so I can’t in good faith recommend to someone that has sensitive skin, but you may want to try it since the Starter Kit is so reasonable in price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. It's a gentle mask. It doesn't stretch your face by tightening. A great way to pull the toxins out.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A. Nakaya-Delk

customer_reviews.title: Works right away
customer_reviews.text: This product is not like so many of the other face products out there; it actually work!! In fact I noticed a different the very first day I used it! It's good for my sensitive skin and doesn't have harsh ingredients or chemicals. Totally natural and works great (not any easy combo to find). I love this mask and will be buying more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: W.U.

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: I loved the smell of this mask. It was very nourishing and my skin felt very soft after. I alternate every week between this mask and the pumpkin glycolic. I also use the 10% glycolic pads everyday. I love the results. None of these has burned my skin. Some redness and a little flaking, which is to be expected with glycolic. However I do not have sensitive skin, and my skin is accustomed to professional peels and laser treatments.
customer_reviews.author: L. Church

customer_reviews.title: Tingly feeling in skin but results are AWSOME !!!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little scared when u put it in because it was burning my skin ! It was very tingling , so I decided to leave it on still because I read the reviews and mostly everyone felt that, then after a while it stopped burning and when I finally rinsed it off I noticed how renewing my skin looked !!!! It makes your skin look like you wiped away any dead skin !! I think that’s what the tingling feeling is , removing dead skin ?! Idk but it works !!! I love it !!
customer_reviews.author: itzel herrera

customer_reviews.title: Feels and smells good, but not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I struggle w acne and combination skin , was looking for a new skin care routine to implement that would include all the steps i need. I love cannabis infused products so this caught my eye. I was skeptical when reading reviews but still decided to order and see for myself. Overall it isnt terrible because it is very moisturizing, but ive noticed its already started to make me break out in places i dont normally even break out. i feel like the fragrance added on top of too much moisturizing properties , is what makes this unsuitable for me. By the end of the day my skin feels a little more oilier than usual after using these products.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Tried it a few times and it doesn’t have any effect at all. No tingling like a peel, no noticeable difference in skin, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Kaster

product_meta.title: Andalou Naturals Pumpkin Honey Glycolic Exfoliating Mask, 1.7 Ounces
product_meta.description: Andalou Naturals glycolic brightening mask with pumpkin honey, Organic pumpkin, rich in Vitamin A, and glycolic AHA gently dissolve the intra-cellular glue that binds dull surface cells and lifts them away, as advanced Fruit Stem Cells stimulate circulation and healthy cell renewal for even tone and texture, revealing a fresh complexion. Ph balanced & hypo-allergenic. Vegetarian & Cruelty Free. Certified organic ingredients. Made naturally without sulfates, GMO, petrochemicals, phthalates, parabens, synthetic fragrance, colors or preservatives.
feature_bullets: PUMPKIN EXFOLIATING MASK: Our Pumpkin Honey Glycolic Mask helps gently clean dirt, impurities & dry cells to exfoliate skin & leave your face feeling & looking smooth, bright & even in tone.
INGREDIENTS FROM NATURE: We support Superior Source Ingredient Standards & only use ingredients that are organic, non-GMO, gluten free, sustainable, fair trade, cruelty free, & nature-derived.

FRUIT STEM CELL SCIENCE: Every Andalou Natural's product—including masks, creams, serums, moisturizers, cleansers, & toners—use nature's antioxidant defense solution to protect & support healthy skin & hair.

ANDALOU NATURALS: We are the first Non-GMO Project Verified beauty brand & our commitment to uplifting people & the planet is reflected in our hair products, cleansers, lotions, serums, face masks & more!
BRIGHTENING WITH VITAMIN C: Andalou Naturals' skin care products with vitamin C may help fight sun damage & promote brighter, more even skin tone in normal & combination skin types.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
